TopicTitle: International Kerbal Space Program Forums/Youtube Minmus Space Station!

Articles.Content:
Hey everyone,

I had the radical idea, (even though The Solar Gamer should be doing this thread, no offense ) of making a Minmus Space Station. I still have to get a save file started up, but I'm certain this will be a great endeavor!

Right now, I have the following peeps queued for questioning to involve in the project

The Solar Gamer (If he saw this, he'd probably want to contribute)

Scott Manley (All my respects to him, I would've never gotten any further in KSP without his rocket science equations)

Danny2462 (If he attaches a crazy module, I'll try my best NOT to break it and provoke the Space Kraken BIG TIME.)

ChickenKeeper24 (He's a cool guy, he should do it)

HOCGaming (Sure, why not? What could possibly go wrong?)

kurtjmac (I like his charity idea of heading to Minecraft's limits, and he does KSP too...so, why not?)

I might add more people, should The Solar Gamer come and Colbert Bump the thread to be as popular as PSY. Or somebody suggests.

I'm not sure if this will get either a lot of support or a lot of hate, as this was one of my dreams from the very start of KSP: build something amazing with the community. And hopefully this is the time!

The acronym for the title is IKSPFYMSS.

And here's the mission flag:

Thanks,

Shinji the Kerbonaut

Hating on Eve's ludicrous gravity since 2013!

Edited July 18, 2013 by Shinji-The-Kerbonaut
Added a peep!
Add Kurtjmac, he's one of the best out there, and I want to see a new KSP vid from him.

Add Kurtjmac, he's one of the best out there, and I want to see a new KSP vid from him.

Ah, okay! ^^

Invitations sent to all listed. Let's hope they accept...

Edited July 19, 2013 by Shinji-The-Kerbonaut
hooray for gendo pose
I hate to say, but I think this might be cancelled as I've never gotten a reply at all from anyone I messaged.

I feel the need to link this thread

why do we need the popular people?
